key.name: fogcolor
key.summary: Fog Color [red, green, blue, alpha]. Fog blends a fog color with each rasterized pixel fragment's posttexturing color using a blending factor f. Factor f is computed in one of three ways (here: f=exp(-density*z)), depending on the fog mode. Let z be the distance in eye coordinates from the origin to the fragment being fogged. Note: you usually want to use the background (clear) color.
